snippet: In his first public remarks, the Federal Reserve’s new vice chairman said the central bank should be empowered to focus on financial stability.
abstract: Stanley Fischer, Federal Reserve’s new vice chairman, says in his first public remarks that Congress should consider making financial stability an explicit priority of the Fed and other financial regulators.
lead_paragraph: In his first public remarks, the Federal Reserve’s new vice chairman said the central bank should be empowered to focus on financial stability.

headline.main: Stanley Fischer Urges Congress to Expand Fed’s Mandate
headline.print_headline: Fischer Urges Congress to Expand Fed’s Mandate
